short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds an option to navigate through comments in any GitHub pull request

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigating through your colleagues comments as never been that easy! This extension is one of those things you never knew you needed till now.
